overview: After learning of Africa's deadly lack of clean water, Canadian first-grader Ryan Hreljac worked tirelessly to save money to build a well in Uganda. Now, thanks to a neighbor's donation of frequent flyer miles, Ryan will see the fruits of his labor. Join the remarkable boy on an emotional journey as he receives a hero's welcome in Africa and is greeted warmly by his longtime pen pal Jimmy in this inspirational documentary.
title: Ryan's Well
